description: Retrieves the resource policies set on individual resources by Resource Access Manager during cross-account permission grants. Also retrieves the Data Catalog resource policy. If you enabled metadata encryption in Data Catalog settings, and you do not have permission on the KMS key, the operation can't return the Data Catalog resource policy.

nested_items.name: GetResourcePoliciesResponseList
nested_items.description: A list of the individual resource policies and the account-level resource policy.

nested_items.name: PolicyInJson
nested_items.description: Contains the requested policy document, in JSON format.

nested_items.name: PolicyHash
nested_items.description: Contains the hash value associated with this policy.

nested_items.name: CreateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time at which the policy was created.

nested_items.name: UpdateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time at which the policy was last updated.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A continuation token, if the returned list does not contain the last resource policy available.
